NII Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Senior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 04, 2025, 09:32 IST
 National Institute of Immunology
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 04-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 42,000 to 42,000




FOLLOW

The National Institute of Immunology (NII) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, M.Tech. can apply for the NII Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

NII Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Research Fellow 	01	M.Sc, M.Tech

Age Limit for the NII Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.

Selection Process for the NII Recruitment 2025 

Interview

Salary Structure for the NII Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary:  Rs. 42,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the NII Recruitment 2025 

For all Candidates: Rs. 100 /- 
Payment Mode: Demand Draft
How to Apply  for the NII Recruitment 2025 
Visit the official website.
Go to the Recruitment or Career Page.
Check for the Senior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility Criteria.
Then, send your CV along with the documents required to the email address given below.

Email Address

bbiswal@nii.ac.in

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	01-08-2025
Last Date of Application	16-08-2025
Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
